h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Gold Button Location
content: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

The content is as follows:
For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.
